column5: The municipality has opted to defer the motion of fishing access  pass till the spring of 2018 . They are going to try one more year of added enforcement and stipulated to all partners that they all step up to the plate and instead of writing letters ,act .  So there will be no changes this year except for the. No night time fishing from molson street to robertson street

good! for now.  and yes, i agree, their partners need to actually go down to the river and see whats happening despite all the extra enforcement.  don't write threatening letters, get out there and actually do something to help prevent it
